title: Reports for cheating
body:
How reliable is the report system for cheating? I just faced a blatant cheater, so I obviously reported it because I think cheating in video games is deplorable, and I had a little chat with him in the post game lobby after everyone left because I seemed to be the only player in the game to notice, and I asked him his incentive and he just said "it's funny"

So I think what would be funny is getting his account that he bought boosts and skins on banned, so is this report going to do something or shall I record a demo and send it in?

replies.body: As long as you were able to smash that report button in the post-game lobby and fill out the form you should be good to go.
